name: KooZac
description:
The award-winning, cult-classic KooZac is back with a fresh new look for mobile.

KooZac is a game caught between Tetris and Sudoku that’s as challenging as it is entertaining. The concept is simple: position the falling blocks on top of each other to create the target numbers and clear the blocks.

Described as utterly addictive yet surprisingly educational, KooZac takes the best bits of a block puzzler and a mental challenge game to produce one hard-to-put-down revelation.

- Free to play forever
- Easy to learn, endless fun to play
- Like Tetris with numbers
- Designed to improve mental arithmetic
- Beat your high score
